SELECT NVL(MAX(BOOK_NO), 0) + 1 AS BOOK_NO FROM BOOK_TBL_06
mapper.insert: insert into book_tbl_06( BOOK_NO, BOOK_NAME, BOOK_COVERIMG, BOOK_DATE, BOOK_PRICE, BOOK_PUBLISHER, BOOK_INFO ) values ( #{bookNo}, #{bookName}, #{bookCoverimg}, #{bookDate}, #{bookPrice}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookInfo} )
mapper.select: select b.book_no, b.book_name, SUM(r.rent_price) as total_price , COUNT(*) as rent_count from book_tbl_06 b join rent_tbl_06 r on b.book_no = r.book_no group by b.book_no, b.book_name order by 4 DESC, 4 DESC, 1 ASC
